components.hint: Depicts a head on top of a person.

images.description: 蔡侯殘鼎蓋(金)春秋晚期

hint: Phonosemantic compound. 頁 represents the meaning and 豆 represents the sound.

chars.hint: Pictograph of a stemmed bowl. Based on the original meaning "vessel with a neck". The current meaning is a phonetic loan.
chars.shuowen: 《說文》：“豆，古食肉器也。从口，象形。，古文豆。”

chars.hint: Pictograph of a head (首) on top of a person (卩). Means "head" when pronounced xié. Has unrelated meaning "leaf" when pronounced yè, due to this character being adopted as a variant form of 葉.
chars.shuowen: 《說文》：“頁，頭也。从，从儿。古文如此。者首字也。”

comments.text: 李孝定《甲骨文字集釋》：“古文頁𦣻首當為一字，頁象頭及身，𦣻但象頭，首象頭及其上髮小異耳。”按：清嚴可均等認為“𦣻者䭫首字也”六字是後人所贅入的校語。

words.pinyinSearchString: yè ye4 ye xié xie2 xie
